amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the War Powers Resolution; and require the President to consult with the Congress in most cases before committing United States forces to imminent hostilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to repeal the War Powers Resolution and to require the President to consult with Congress, as much as possible, before committing U.S. troops to imminent hostilities The amendment would require the President to report to Congress within 48 hours of after commiting troops to a hostile area or deploying troops to a foreign country for other than routine purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 217 (Roll no. 359).
